oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Photograph of Union veteran J. W. Oliver
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph depicting J. W. Oliver, Co F, 4th Tenn. Inf. Regt., with his family in La Grand, Oregon. Also pictured are Emma Taylor Oliver, Ruth Oliver, and John Oliver, donor of the photo. His service record spells his name as John Olliver. Mr. Oliver is pictured with US flags, possibly on the 4th of July, wearing his GAR ribbon and holding the Bible in this photograph.
